messages.title: We need a hardworking local Lib Dem MP
messages.content: Colin Eldridge is fighting to keep our local health services safe from government cuts.

messages.title: It's so close!
messages.content: Colin led the campaign to save Alder Hey's Acute Burns Unit. The Conservative are far behind and cannot win in Liverpool. A vote for them could mean 5 more years of Labour.

messages.title: Labour Civil War
messages.content: London Labour's candidate didn't even know who Bill Shankly was.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Colin Eldridge has a record of campaigning for more police on our streets.
Colin Eldridge changed the dangerous dogs law to ensure that the people of Liverpool could feel safe in the city.

mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable campaigning to get Britain a fairer deal
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only local Lib Dem, Colin Eldridge or London Labour's candidate can win here in Liverpool.

issues.education: Smaller class sizes; more cash for schools and abolish university tuition fees.
issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and give the regions fairer funding.
issues.health: Colin is demanding the Government take action on the Royal and Alder Hey Hospitals now.

images.caption: Colin Eldridge, Nick Clegg and Vince Cable campaigning to get Britain a fairer deal.
Colin Eldridge with a young supporter
The tactical voting situation in Liverpool.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The election is described as being very close, with a choice between local Lib Dem Colin Eldridge and the London Labour candidate.
